Javascript

!! This section is in the "Collecting Resources" phase !!

Tutorials @ Jumpstart for JS and JQ: http://tutorials.jumpstartlab.com/

Rebuild interactive features like a dropdown... start by building the tools, then use them, then abstract further.

Backbone: http://backbonetutorials.com/ http://coenraets.org/blog/2011/12/backbone-js-wine-cellar-tutorial-part-1-getting-started/ http://javascriptissexy.com/learn-backbone-js-completely/

Node: http://blog.modulus.io/absolute-beginners-guide-to-nodejs

Blogs: http://superherojs.com/ http://javascriptissexy.com/

Roadmap

  1. Introduction
  2. About Web Developers
  3. Installations
  4. Pair Programming
  5. Web Development 101
    1. How Does the Web Work?
    2. How Does Your Computer Work?
    3. Terms to Know
    4. Web Programming Basics
      1. Front End Basics
        1. HTML and CSS Basics
        2. Project: HTML / CSS
        3. Javascript and jQuery Basics
        4. Project: JS and jQuery
      2. Back End Basics
        1. Ruby Basics
        2. Project: Ruby
      3. Databases
      4. Web Development Frameworks
        1. Ruby on Rails
        2. Project: Ruby on Rails
        3. Backbone.js
      5. Tying It All Together
      6. Additional Important Topics
    5. How are Websites Built?
    6. Principles of Good Programming
    7. Other "Dumb" Questions Answered
    8. Finish2
  6. Ruby
  7. Git (Coming Soon!)
  8. Databases (Coming Soon!)
  9. Ruby on Rails
  10. HTML and CSS
  11. Javascript
  12. Tying It All Together
